summary: New sign for the shop in Solitude
descriptionHtml:
Solitude: Angeline's Aromatics alternative sign

by Autan Waspeez
v.1.0


***THIS IS NOW OBSOLETE: NEW VERSION INCLUDED IN MY 'SIGNS OF SKYRIM' MOD***

Get that instead, it's got all sorts of good things! :)

DESCRIPTION
===========
A replacement texture and UV-map adjusted mesh for the shop sign Angeline's Aromatics in Solitude.

Does anyone like that weird 'steaming pestle' sign? Don't answer that. I just found it really a bit dull, so I changed it for my own pleasure, and also so I can see which shop it is I'm going to. The sign for Angeline's Aromatics is now a wood carving that to my eyes stands out a bit more. I've left it as weathered wood, as I imagine the climate in Skyrim isn't kind to gaudily painted signs. I've left a glowmap channel in the mesh for those using Mystical Illumination by EvilDeadAsh34, though it's set to no emission at present. If you've got Nifskope and you want it to light up like a neon sign, go for it :)

Installation:
Drop the Meshes and Textures folders into your Skyrim/data directory, merging when asked and saying 'yes' to the prompt to overwrite. Make sure your Archive Invalidation is updated.

Uninstallation:
Remove these files -
data/meshes/clutter/signage/solitude/signangelinesaromatics.nif
data/textures/clutter/signage/solitude/signangelinesaromatics.dds + signangelinesaromatics.dds_n + signangelinesaromatics_g.dds


Usual disclaimer: if this hurts your computer, don't blame me, I didn't hold a gun to your head while you installed it. If you want to use it in a mod, credit me, otherwise no permission needed.
author: Autan Waspeez
